com.salimov.yurii.util.cache

Interface ICache


  • public interface ICache
    The interface describes a set of methods for working with cache.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the cache.
      void clear(java.lang.Class object)
      Clears objects by class.
      <T> boolean exist(T key)
      Checks if exist object with the key in the cache.

      Returns object from cache with key.

      Returns keys of objects in cache.

      Returns information about objects in cache.
      int getMaxSize()
      Gets maximum size of objects which can be stored in the cache.
      int getSize()
      Gets size of objects which storing in the cache.

        Parameters:

        milliseconds - a lifetime of objects (milliseconds).

      • get

        <T> java.lang.Object get(T key)
        Returns object from cache with key. Returns null if key is null.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a type of key.
        Parameters:
        key - a object key in the cache.
        Returns:
        The object with key or null.

      • getAll

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> getAll(java.lang.String subKey)
        Returns all objects from cache with subKey.
        Parameters:
        subKey - a object key in the cache.
        Returns:
        The objects with key or empty list.

      • remove

        <T> void remove(T key)
        Removes object from cache with key. Removes object if key is not null.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a type of key.
        Parameters:
        key - a object key in the cache.

      • removeAll

        void removeAll(java.lang.String... subKey)
        Removes all objects from the cache if they key contains the string subKey. Removes objects if subKey is not blank. The objects are removed in a parallel thread.
        Parameters:
        subKey - a key string.

      • setAll

        <T> void setAll(java.util.Map<T,java.lang.Object> map)
        Sets map with objects.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a type of key.
        Parameters:
        map - a map with objects.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the cache.

      • clear

        void clear(java.lang.Class object)
        Clears objects by class.
        Parameters:
        object - a objects class to remove.

      • exist

        <T> boolean exist(T key)
        Checks if exist object with the key in the cache.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a type of key.
        Parameters:
        key - a object key in the cache.
        Returns:
        true if object is exist, false otherwise.

      • getEntriesToString

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getEntriesToString()
        Returns information about objects in cache. Information about cache saved in cache too.
        Returns:
        The maps with entries.

      • getEntriesKeys

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getEntriesKeys()
        Returns keys of objects in cache.
        Returns:
        The list with keys.

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Gets size of objects which storing in the cache.
        Returns:
        The size of objects which storing in the cache.

        Gets maximum size of objects which can be stored in the cache.
        Returns:
        The maximum size of objects which can be stored in the cache.

      • setMaxSize

        void setMaxSize(int maxMapSize)
        Sets maximum size of objects which can be stored in the cache.
        Parameters:
        maxMapSize - a maximum size of objects which can be stored in the cache.
